DOC.brief_summary: To measure effect Medical health plan-directed automate telephone self-management support system ( ATSM ) patient outcome among ethnically diverse health plan enrollees diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Harnessing Health IT Self-Management Support Medication Activation Medicaid Health Plan
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct evaluation quality improvement initiative San Francisco Health Plan ( SFHP ) , large Medicaid manage care plan SF , conduct approximately 500 SFHP enrollee diabetes attend 4 Community Health Network Clinics San Francisco ( CHNSF ) two year period . The intervention SFHP implementing Automated Telephone Support Management ( ATSM ) , health IT innovation use adjunct care management . The partnership University California , San Francisco-San Francisco General Hospital ( UCSF-SFGH ) researcher base previous work do CHNSF regard use ATSM among diabetes patient improve self-management activity health outcomes , current demonstration project evaluation , recruitment participant implementation intervention do SFHP ; UCSF conduct evaluation . The Governing Board SFHP decide adopt ATSM model grow number diabetes patient , dedicate nursing staff respond ATSM data engage enrollees provider , underwrite cost ATSM implementation , randomly assign patient one two type ATSM ( one involve medication review/intensification vs. one deliver behavioral support ) , contact eligible SFHP member ATSM also briefly describe evaluation study carry UCSF . We , UCSF researcher , evaluate impact intervention patient outcomes . There limited contact patient UCSF research team . UCSF research staff contact patient SFHP determine patient interested contacted evaluation ; collection personal health information UCSF evaluator . UCSF research staff conduct telephone survey verbal consent procedure , baseline 6 month ( patient wait-listed , 12 month ) , patient participate ATSM intervention . The SFHP maintain identification ( ID ) link patient intervention conduct evaluation , patient-linked survey data , UCSF link health-related data SFHP regard patient outcome , although de-identified data include UCSF evaluation . UCSF conduct quantitative data analysis de-identified data provide u SFHP set time study period examine impact intervention clinical outcome . The evaluation focus effect ATSM patient-centered outcome clinical outcome `` real-world '' effectiveness study . The fact recruitment implementation carry SFHP , SFHP maintain link patient evaluation survey data link individual , SFHP control personal health information patient , important implication generalizability .
